all:
g!help [topic]
g!roll [roll request]
g!gurps [search, get]
g!upload [character name] [attachment]
help:
Provides a brief description and example of how to use a command.
Usage: g!help [topic] e.g. 'g!help all' will print all bot commands.
roll:
Returns the result of a dice roll.
Usage: g!roll [#dice to roll]d[sides]+/-/*[modifier]
e.g. 'g!roll 3d6', 'g!roll 1d20', 'g!roll 1d6+3'
gurps:
Searches GURPS advantages and disadvantages for a given keyword.
Usage: 'g!gurps [search] e.g. 'g!gurps Blessed'
upload:
Uploads a character sheet to the bot so that it can be easily referenced later.
Usage: 'g!gurps upload [character name]' with an attached .gcs file
